div.div: Case Western Reserve vs. Grove City
at Grove City, Pa. | Robert E Thorn Field

tr.td: Grove City wins toss, defers, will kick and defend south goal.
Payton Carlucci kickoff 50 yards to the CWR15, Brendan Lynch return 15 yards to the CWR30 (S. McLoughlin).
Case Western Reserve drive start at 15:00.
Rob Cuda pass complete to Jacob Burke for 9 yards to the CWR39 (Jimmy Cianciola).
Myles Anthony rush for 1 yard to the CWR40 (Quinton Reed).
Myles Anthony rush for 1 yard to the CWR41 (Andrew Seifert).
Rob Cuda pass incomplete to Giuseppe Orsini.
Jacob Burke punt 37 yards to the GRO22, downed.
Wesley Schools rush for no gain to the GRO22 (Zach Lyon).
Brett Laffoon sacked for loss of 4 yards to the GRO18 (Zach Lyon).
Brett Laffoon sacked for loss of 9 yards to the GRO09 (Zach Lyon).
A. Marnejon punt 28 yards to the GRO37, downed.
Case Western Reserve drive start at 10:57.
Rob Cuda pass complete to Hunter Tulloch for 34 yards to the GRO03.
Jeffrie Brown rush for loss of 1 yard to the GRO04 (Connor Lowe).
Rob Cuda pass incomplete to Brendan Lynch, QB hurry by Shawn Simmons.
Rob Cuda pass complete to Justin Phan for 4 yards to the GRO00, TOUCHDOWN, clock 09:39.

Brett Laffoon pass complete to Brett Pinson for 5 yards to the GRO19 (Nick Kwon).
TEAM rush for loss of 3 yards to the GRO16, fumble by TEAM recovered by GRO Wesley Schools at GRO17 (Justin McMahon).
Brett Laffoon pass incomplete to Nick Ponikvar.
A. Marnejon punt 33 yards to the 50 yardline, Justin Phan return 6 yards to the GRO44 (Cobie Pratt; Chris Wolfe).

Brett Laffoon pass complete to Brett Pinson for 2 yards to the GRO37 (Justin McMahon).
Brett Laffoon pass intercepted by Tyler Doty at the GRO36, Tyler Doty return 4 yards to the GRO32 (A. Marnejon).

Game delayed at 7:22 due to lightning
